Text: Ama o̩jo̩ ejodudu ef o̩jo̩ mebie, inajo̩, inajo̩, ma lewʼugbo oji le̩, ma nʼe̩wñ ki akpo ku ma ñwo̩che le̩ wa.
Oñ ma li abʼokuta muliubi bʼalu oji te̩.
Taku mamugudu, ma la li año̩la Ondu Jisusi n.
Tak i leatu, abu kʼibe takpa rʼuma efu, me̩ go, aboke̩le̩ meji, kʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma afane̩ gbaa, wa bano ma.
Oñ abu kʼailo̩ fu ma mu, ku ma la fʼoji dalo̩ wʼane̩, ma ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ feju e̩ne̩ ki deju ef abo ki ku?
I dʼemi n, i kwane̩ me̩; me̩ dibekadʼalu kʼi ko̩la ñwu me̩ e̩gba kʼi de̩ Galili le̩,
i ka ku ma adʼO̩ma One̩ tef o̩wo̩ ame̩nadure tila, ku ma fu kamoli, tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ i adabi kwane̩.
Taku ma rewa o̩la kʼi ka,
oñ ma mudabi kwʼugbo oji le̩ wa, ma la fʼuka e̩wñ-i du je̩ ñw abo me̩gwaka le̩ kpʼabo ki bo̩ chaka.
Ama le̩ la che Me̩ri e-Magdalini kpai Jo̩ana kpai Me̩ri e-Jeme̩s; tak abobule̩ ki bo̩ ku ma jʼugbo ma fʼe̩wñ-i ka ñw ame̩nukpuche̩.
O̩la le̩ la dab o̩la e̩fule̩fu eju-ma; oñ ma ko̩ eke̩do̩nʼo̩la-ma. [
Ama Pita kwane̩, i fule nyʼugbo oji le̩; tak i tejukpe̩ go, i li ukpo line̩n le̩ kate ki jo̩ ojoji; tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼugbo abo-wñ; i nayaye e̩wñ ki wache le̩.]
Me̩ la go, one̩ meji ef uma dʼej o̩na alo tʼadogbe kʼodu-wñ ko̩ E̩meus o̩jo̩ le gbage̩de̩, ujiji-wñ akwo Je̩rusale̩m dab imaili mebie nyʼe̩bo̩.
Ma la nʼoluka e̩wñ ki ke̩re̩bo̩ ma-i du ache kpʼomune̩.
Oñ i leatu, ef oluka ku ma che, kpʼene ku ma nʼomune̩, Jisus, onugo, la te̩meru ma, oñ i le kpʼama.
Ama e̩wñʼka fʼo̩wo̩ bʼuma eju ma ku ma we emejumʼowñ.
Oñ i ka ñw ma kakini, O̩la e̩wñ me̩ jʼaro̩ kpʼomune̩ abu ku me̩ lule̩-i? Taku ma kwodago, ma fʼeju-ma bunyo̩wo̩.
Tak e̩ne̩ʼka-ma kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Kliopas dohi ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ kate dodo kpʼo̩la-we̩ Je̩rusale̩m le̩, kʼe̩ ma ma e̩wñ ki wache iko-i n?
Tak i ka ñw ma kakini, Owñ chʼe̩wñ? Oñ ma ka ñw u ka kʼo̩la e-Jisus abo Nazare̩t e-kʼi chʼakache̩ kʼi nʼukpahiu ef uko̩lo̩ kpʼo̩la eju O̩jo̩ kpai eju amone̩ chaka;
kpai alu kʼamagboji amatama kpʼamagboji wa mʼowñ du tʼef ajo̩ uku, ku ma laño̩ mʼu du kamoli.
A la kibeno ka kʼowñ ma chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi ache kʼi agba abo Israe̩l tane̩. Oñ amanyʼe-le̩ du, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta kʼe̩wñ-i wache de̩.
Abobule̩ iche̩ka ef uwa ño̩ je̩ ñw ibe-wa kpatuka ge̩, abu ku ma jʼugbo oji inajo̩-i;
oñ abu ku ma ma li año̩la-wñ n, ma lewa ka kʼama fʼamonuche̩ O̩jo̩ li ef ane̩ ego ku ma ka kʼowñ deju.
Tak iche̩ka ef abo ku ma jʼugbo wa le tugbo oji, oñ ma li ka kʼi dʼalu kʼabobule̩ le̩ ka; ma muda li owñ onugo n.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ ku me̩ ma nʼibe n, kʼe̩do̩-me̩ ache̩durʼeke̩do̩no e̩wñ du kʼamakache̩ ka le̩!
Idukpe̩ ku Kraist ali uwa ugbo e̩wñ-i tila n? kʼi laño̩ mugudu tef ojima-wñ n?
Tak i chane̩ akwo Mose̩s kpʼamakache̩ chaka, oñ i fʼomudechi o̩la e̩wñ-wñ du kʼi dʼef O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ je̩ ñwu ma.
Oñ ma me̩ru adogbe ugbo ku ma nyi le̩ alo waa; tak i che dabe̩ne̩ kʼi ale gudu nyʼo̩gba.
Taku ma chʼadahi-wñ kakini, E̩ bʼuwa gugu todu ane̩ alo̩, o̩jo̩ la me̩ru edu me̩. Tak i mugudu tʼejefu kʼi bʼuma gugu.
Oñ i leatu, abu kʼi chekukane̩ kʼi jʼe̩wñ kpʼama, i mʼakala du oñ i fʼugwa-wñ gwa; tak i fu bu, oñ i mʼu du ñwu ma.
Tak eju-ma mune̩, oñ ma fʼowñ ma; tak i takpa rʼuma eju.
Taku ma ka ñw omune̩ kakini, E̩do̩-wa bʼuwa je̩ abu kʼi ko̩la ñw a ej o̩na abu kʼi nʼO̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ abi rʼuwa eju le̩ n?
Taku ma kwane̩ auwa le̩ gbage̩de̩, ma la mudabi nyi Je̩rusale̩m, oñ ma li kʼabo me̩gwaka le̩ jejujo kpʼabo ku ma jʼugbo ma,
ma kakini, Ochochi, Ondu kwane̩ me̩, i laño̩ kwotejugede ñwu Saimo̩n.
Taku ma fʼe̩wñ ej o̩na le̩ choli jo̩, kpai alu ku ma meju mʼowñ ef akala kʼi bu le̩.
Oñ abu ku ma jʼako̩la e̩wñ-i, owñ onugo kwodago alumeji ma, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ure̩do̩ ki dʼugbo me̩.
Ma muda kwogagogodo, ailo fʼuma mu, ma do̩ kʼafuʼka ma li le̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ chʼe̩do̩ ñwa ñwala? Tode̩wñ o̩la elo kwane̩ ef e̩do̩-me̩?
Me̩ gʼo̩wo̩-mi kpʼe̩re̩-mi, kakini, Omi onugo de̩; me̩ dʼo̩wo̩ che mi ku me̩ go; todabu kʼafu ma ne̩ o̩re̩la kpai achiku dabalu kʼame̩ li kʼomi ne̩-i n. [
Tak abu kʼi fʼe-kide̩ ka, i mʼo̩wo̩-wñ kpʼe̩re̩-wñ ko ñama.]
Oñ abu ku ma ma ke̩do̩no ta n, noj eyo̩ ku ma yo̩, ku ma laño̩ jo̩ ayaye, i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ne̩ e̩wñ kʼa je̩ emi?
Taku ma mʼe̩bu e̩ja ewoʼka du ñw u.
Oñ i mʼu du, i la je̩ eju-ma.

Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, E-i chʼo̩la-mi kʼu ka ñwu me̩ e̩gba kʼu dʼugbo me̩ ta, ka kʼi chʼotila kʼe̩wñ du ki che̩ko̩tane̩ ef o̩loda Mose̩s kpʼamakache̩ kpʼEli ku Defid ko̩ do̩ O̩jo̩ ugbo o̩la-mi, ki che̩ kpa.
E̩gbale̩ i mʼibe-ma bi, kʼama ki moji O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Abe̩le̩ i che̩ko̩tane̩ ka ku Kraist ali uwa kʼi lañʼakwane̩ kwef abo ki ku o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta;
ku ma ki ño̩ fʼakoya ibe erida kpai adure eto̩no̩ ta ef odu-wñ ugbo abo uche̩ichi chaka, kʼama ki chane̩ Je̩rusale̩m.
Ame̩ chʼame̩nibenu e̩wñ kide̩.
Me̩ la go, omi akpʼe̩wñ kʼAta-mi kʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ le̩ dufu abʼume̩ ma: ame̩ ki muda gugu ewo-i, gbogbo wʼe̩gba ku ma dʼukpahiu kwo ojale tʼo̩la-me̩.
Oñ i mʼuma ko ledufu, gbogbo wa Be̩tani: tak i mʼo̩wo̩-wñ ko dago, i la de̩nyo̩ ñwu ma.
Oñ i leatu, abu kʼi do̩mo̩ ade̩nyo̩ ñwu ma le̩, i kwobʼuma te̩, ma la mʼowñ du tʼefojale.
Taku ma dojikane̩ ñw u, oñ ma mudabi nyi Je̩rusale̩m kpʼuyo̩ lile;
ma la jʼef unyi O̩jo̩ e̩gba du akele O̩jo̩.
